Title: Hotel Salvation
Writer: Shubhashish Bhutiani, Shubhashish Bhutiani, Asad Hussain (dialogue)
Actors: Adil Hussain, Lalit Behl, Geetanjali Kulkarni, Palomi Ghosh
Plot: Faced with his father's untimely and bizarre demand to go and die in the holy city of Varanasi and attain Salvation, a son is left with no choice but to embark on this journey.
